title: Fast As Wind - Corporate Transportation
description: Professional transportation services with experienced drivers
orderSummary: {{user}}, your order contains {{count}} items for a total of ${{total}}

hero.title: Comfortable transport for your business
hero.description: Corporate transportation, transfers, car rental in Minsk and throughout Belarus

about.title: ABOUT COMPANY
about.paragraph1: Faster than Wind is a professional corporate transfer service with our own fleet ranging from economy to premium class. We solve all business transportation tasks: guest transfers, employee transportation, corporate events. We also provide car rental services without a driver.
about.paragraph2: Our fleet includes 40 modern cars: from practical Volkswagen Passat to luxurious Mercedes S-class. All drivers undergo multi-stage selection and regular training, guaranteeing safety, punctuality and impeccable service.
about.paragraph3: We cooperate with Yandex.Taxi and A1 aggregators.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only premium cars and carefully select drivers

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: All trips are performed exactly on schedule without delays

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Full financial responsibility for each order

services.title: WE OFFER
services.subtitle1: We perform the full range of tasks for corporate clients. We are ready to adapt each service to your specific needs and budget. We offer flexible solutions - from individual transfers to complete business transportation support.

employeeTransport.title: Employee Transportation
employeeTransport.description: We provide regular trips for your company employees

guestTransfer.title: Guest Transfer
guestTransfer.description: We will meet with a sign at the airport or station and help with luggage

businessEvents.title: Business Events
businessEvents.description: We organize guest transportation to conferences, forums and exhibitions

intercityTrips.title: Intercity Trips
intercityTrips.description: We will deliver you comfortably to any point in Belarus

corporateEvents.title: Corporate Events & Holidays
corporateEvents.description: We will meet, deliver and take you away after the event

carRental.title: Car Rental
carRental.description: We will provide a car for your needs: with a driver or for personal use

cars.title: OUR VEHICLES
cars.subtitle: Our fleet consists of more than 40 vehicles and includes brands such as Mercedes, BMW, Kia, Volkswagen, Skoda, Peugeot and others. The most popular models are below, but if you are looking for something specific - we will help you choose.

drivers.title: OUR DRIVERS
drivers.description1: Our company is proud of its drivers - true road professionals. These are not just employees, but reliable partners whom we trust like ourselves.
drivers.description2: We have created a team of experts who combine driving skills with care for passenger comfort.

features.training: Has passed thorough selection and training
features.experience: Has many years of accident-free experience

vacancy.title: JOIN OUR TEAM
vacancy.description: We are growing and inviting professionals to join our team! Stable work, comfortable conditions and an atmosphere where your work is valued. Join us - together we achieve more!

vacanciesHero.title: Work at "Faster Than Wind" Company
vacanciesHero.subtitle: Become part of our team of professional drivers

income.description: From 2500 BYN per month with full employment

career.title: Career Growth
career.description: Opportunity to become a senior driver or manager

requirements.license: Category B driving license (3+ years experience)
requirements.experience: Experience in passenger transportation is welcome

notFound.description: You may have followed an incorrect link or the page has been moved.

Offer.title: Ready to join our team?
Offer.description: Fill out the form and we will contact you within 24 hours to discuss cooperation details.

documents.question: What documents are required for employment?
documents.answer: Passport, category B driver's license, medical certificate, work book (if available). A criminal record certificate is also required.

probation.question: Is there a probationary period?
probation.answer: The probationary period is 2 weeks, during which we evaluate your driving skills, knowledge of the city and adaptation to the team.

vehicle.question: Is a vehicle provided?
vehicle.answer: Yes, we provide fully serviced vehicles from our fleet. Fuel, maintenance and insurance are covered by the company.

schedule.question: What is the work schedule?
schedule.answer: Flexible 24/7 work schedule. You can choose convenient shifts: day, night or mixed. Minimum 8 hours per day.

payment.question: How is payment made?
payment.answer: Weekly payment to your card. System: fixed rate + percentage from orders + bonuses for quality work and customer reviews.
